original_text: And shall make him of quick understanding in the fear of the Lord: and he shall not judge after the sight of his eyes, neither reprove after the hearing of his ears:
korean_text: 그가 여호와를 경외함으로 즐거움을 삼을 것이며 그의 눈에 보이는 대로 심판하지 아니하며 그의 귀에 들리는 대로 판단하지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: And shall make him of quick understanding
in the fear of the Lord:
and he shall not judge after the sight of his eyes,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 눈에 보이는 대로 판단하지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: neither reprove after the hearing of his ears:
